product_name: SIGMA SPORT R1 Bluetooth Heart Rate Monitor Chest Strap
long_description: Use your Bluetooth(R)-enabled iPhone, iPad, computer or fitness device to track your heart rate with the SIGMA SPORT R1 Bluetooth Heart Rate Monitor Chest Strap. Bluetooth SMART uses less power to transmit data so your devices consume less power during workouts. The SIGMA SPORT R1 communicates with multiple smartphones, computers and sports devices including the iPhone 4s, 5, 5s, 5c and iPad Air, Mini and 3rd and 4th gen. Most devices which use Bluetooth SMART READY technology are also compatable with the R1, for a full list see the Bluetooth website. Compatible with the SIGMA MOVE app.
